TopicTitle: Water without collision after making planets bigger with Kopernicus

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone.

Last time I've decided to back to playing KSP. Stock system is boring me after so many hours spent on KSP so I want to make it little harder (I know about Real Solar System but I want to stay on Kerbal system). So I've found mods which makes Kerbal system 4x bigger. I speak about this one:
https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/145178-1xx-4x-solar-system/

and this:
https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/142673-113-4x-kerbol-system-clouds-opm/
 

And here is problem: No matter what mod I choose, they have same problem - water has no collision. When I back from orbit and try to land on water, all objects simply fly through water surface and crashing on the bottom of ocean. Without these mods water is fine. Is there any way to solve this? There is no log because I don't know which log should I attach. If you tell me I will give it. Thank you in advance.

Edit: Ok I managed to fix that. It was caused by lack of the Ocean section in config. after adding it everything is fine now.

Edited June 18, 2018 by BlackAndWhite
Problem solved
